recipesJson.name: Straw'Nilla Milk
recipesJson.author: Freshepies
recipesJson.description:
Tasty Strawberry Vanilla Milk Shake and Vape, will develop richness and malty'ness over the course of a 5 day steep.
Sweeten to taste.

reviews.text: I wanted to vape some stuff with Strawberry Cheesecake since that flavor is fire and I am glad I chose this one! Very tasty.
